text: The Littoral–Inner Carniola Statistical Region () is a statistical region in Slovenia. Until 1 January 2015, it was named the Inner Carniola–Karst Statistical Region (). == Municipalities == The Littoral–Inner Carniola Statistical Region has six municipalities: * Bloke * Cerknica * Ilirska Bistrica * Loška Dolina * Pivka * Postojna Category:Statistical regions of Slovenia
title: Littoral–Inner Carniola Statistical Region
